input.sentences: i do n't like to travel as part of a tour . i like to strike out on my own | and find beauty like this waterfall .
i like to see the kind of buildings that never show up on tours .
there is a real beauty to me in ruins .
and among the ruins | you find hidden gems like this church .
the undisturbed bays surrounded by cliffs are better to me than beaches .
output.sentences: We stumbled upon a beautiful stream and the ruins of some factory.
After further investigation, we found what looked like a door.
It was located in a rural area, outside of town, where everything was green.
Walking further, we saw an ornate and historical looking church.
To the side, there was a large body of water.
